name: AbductCow
description:
A little game realized for the BTP Game Jam #2

You have been engage to protect cow's on two mini planet. Your enemies are Imp that spawn from under the ground on the green planet and Alien that navigate the sky of the yellow one. Imp will attack quick before disappearing and Alien have they radar jam due to our technologie so they will zap randomly in hope of getting a cow.

Your tool to defend the cow are seed [right click] that grow plant witch cow love and a portal [left-click] witch will transport any life forme from planet to planet.

The portal ancient so it's range is limited to one cell around you and need some recharge time

Controls : 

- WASD or ZQSD to move your character (TAB to toggle helper around planets)

- Left click press : will make a marker appear if the marker turn blue and you release it will teleport the thing is pointing at ( PS : you can teleport yourself)

- Right click will place seed on the cell your standing after a short period it will grow and attract the nearest cow

The background music was downloaded  on freesound it's by the user Jay_You : https://freesound.org/people/Jay_You/sounds/460432/
